captions.text: Hello, we're BTS!
The best rookie BTS is back!
with its second mini album 'Skool Luv Affair'!
BTS is back as tough macho guys!

Even though we may seem tough and wild from our
appearance, we are very gentle and soft inside

This time, we transformed into romantic yet
tough rebels who wish to win girls' heart
Show them what it is like to be a tough guy
Tough guy smell~ smell~

We've prepared 'Boy In Luv' dance
for those who don't know yet

If girls can master this dance
they can also be like tough guys
Okay, then let's dance with BTS!
BTS - Boy In Luv
The first point dance is called King Kong dance
First, make your arms round like this

Think as if there is a beautiful woman standing
right in front of you. What would you do?
Beat your chest like this

In a cute way? No!
In a sexy way? No!
Only in a tough way!

Repeat this four times and that's it
Very easy, right?
King Kong dance
The second point dance is called shaving dance

For this dance, you should think that
you are the best in the world
First, brush your hair back

and then touch your chin as if
you shaved perfectly today

Pull your pants up and shake your hands
as if you're wiping off the dust
I guess he's covered with so much dust today
Go ahead and wipe it off

When you were young, you probably had
made fun of your friend once

Hide your face with your hand and point a finger
at your friend as if you're making fun of him
Hide your mouth and point with your right hand
Oh wait, I forgot to mention 'Hey~'

Think as if you are the best in the world
and show your confident face
Shaving dance

Unfortunately, the last dance move
doesn't have a name yet
Please make one for this dance after watching it
We will send our autographed CD
And we promise to keep the name forever

Let's say there's a person you don't really like
what would you do? as a tough guy
Grab him by the collar with both hands

Poke downwards and then
shake off with your right arm

Then rub you right leg on the floor and
draw a line across your chest with left hand
Poke! then shake off and rub again

Here, the point is to stare fiercely
with tough face. Then, it's perfect

More importantly, you should grab
onto your pants while dancing
Why?

It means "You're mine"
"These pants are mine"
'Make a name for this' dance

'Man In Luv' point dance 1
King Kong dance

'Man In Luv' point dance 2
Shaving dance

'Man In Luv' point dance 3
'Make a name for this' dance

Charismatic and rough eyes are
very important so don't forget
Hope you become a tough guy with BTS in 2014
Until now, this was Let's Dance with BTS!

title: Let's Dance: BTS(방탄소년단) _ Boy In Luv(상남자) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
